document_data.mainbody:
Ransarans Sergeant-at-Arms was a weapons shop located in the city of Daggerford in the Western Heartlands in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The shop was located along Dukes Way in central Daggerford abutting the landrise.
The shops owner, Ransaran, was a highly skilled weaponsmith who forged quality pieces. His prices were steep but most customers thought them fair considering the weapon quality.
